setting.name: enable
setting.label: Enable
setting.description: If disabled the Tooltip JavaScript will not be loaded.

setting.name: activation
setting.label: Activation Method
setting.description: Select the default activation method for tooltips.

setting.name: position
setting.label: Default Position
setting.description: Select the default position for tooltips.

setting.name: gutter
setting.label: Edge Offset (in px)
setting.description: The amount of space between the tooltip and the originating element.

setting.name: maxwidth
setting.label: Maximum Width (in px)
setting.description: Sets the maximum width of the toltips.

setting.name: delay
setting.label: Delay (in ms)
setting.description: The delay before fading in tooltips onto the screen.

setting.name: fadeIn
setting.label: Fade in speed (in ms)
setting.description: Fade in speed of the tooltips.

setting.name: fadeOut
setting.label: Fade out speed (in ms)
setting.description: Fade out speed of the tooltips.

setting.name: sticky
setting.label: Sticky Tooltip
setting.description: If enabled all tooltips will be sticky by default.

setting.name: selector
setting.label: Selector
setting.description: You can customize the default selector to activate the tooltip on other elements.
